alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 14 at 3:51AM MST until December 14 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is in effect today from 10 AM to 6 PM MST for gusty winds and low relative humidity for fire weather zones 233 through 237, which includes eastern Las Animas, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties... ...A Red Flag warning is now in effect for Wednesday from 10 AM to 5 PM for VERY STRONG winds and low relative humidity values for fire weather zones 228 through 237, which includes Pueblo, Huerfano, Las Animas, Crowley, Otero, Kiowa, Bent, Prowers and Baca Counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 233...234...235...236 AND 237... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 233...234...235...236 AND 237... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a Red Flag Warning for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which is in effect from 10 AM to 5 PM MST Wednesday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 233...234...235...236 and 237. * Winds...For today...Southwest 10 to 20 with gusts to 35 mph. For Wednesday, Southwest 35 to 55 mph with gusts up to 80 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 11 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon; Kiowa County Including Eads; Prowers County Including Lamar
